text: « Input: a set of key-value pairs <k, v> e map(k,v) = <ky,vy>, <kj, v,>, ..., <k, vn> * Takes a key-value pair and outputs a set of key-value pairs (possibly zero) + One map call for every input <k,v> pair « reduce(k, [vy, ..., v,]) = <k, v1>, ..., <k, v¢> * All values v; with the same key k are reduced together * There is one reduce call for each unigue key k produced by map
